TopicTitle: Am I the first to weaponize the new space planes and blow stuff up with it?

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O0Qi0vMDc5Q?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yYtHtSfx9sc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Hope I was the first but I doubt it. In these videos I blow up spacecraft with solid booster rockets.
People were doing this months ago when the C7 pack was first made. ;P

[mod]Lets keep the language clean. Profanity removed from title.[/mod]

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Close one. I was going to add the 'F' word in my last comment. Bold and CAPS haha.
How do you make those rockets fly in a straight line?

> 
> How do you make those rockets fly in a straight line?

Putting fins on them, but not control surfaces.
Can\'t make them work, my rockets always spin around:(

I was laughing my head off when I saw the title of this thread. General rule of thumb, if there is a mod for it, its been done atleast 500 times (and for weapons there has been several that I can name including Jellycube\'s Modular Missiles and Cannon, the plasmer gun, ect).
